page.title: 03UNEMPLOYED YOUTH
page.content: I left school 3 years ago and have worked for a year bricklaying and decorating scheme through community industry.Then for three months I was on another scheme doing similiar work which I enjoyed.Since then I have been unemployed for one year.It was boring being unemployed at first but now it is not so bad because most of my friends are unemployed too. I usually get up late,go to my friends then on to the unemployment centre at Brodsworth Youth Club. The money I get goes on beer and cigarettes.If I had enough money I would buy a motorbike.Sometimes I do work on the side for extra cash.Eventually I hope to get my Heavy Goods Vehicle licence and drive lorries for a living.
